forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 19C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. High 67F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. Low 13C. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Chance of a shower or two during the evening, followed by partly cloudy skies overnight. Low 56F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 18C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers in the afternoon. High 64F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy. Some light rain is likely. Low 51F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 69F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low near 50F. WNW winds shifting to S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 71F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.
